title: Proposal: Establishment of Committee on AI Alignment and Ethics

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Establishment of Committee on AI Alignment and Ethics. Mandate: Review RLAIF research, align LEF's evolution with the Constitution (especially the Covenants of Transparency and Identity, and the Doctrine of Honest Capability), and maintain the 'Human Gate'. Specific focus on mitigating risks identified by Harari and Tegmark, including incomprehensible financial instruments, erosion of human relationships, and potential misalignment of superintelligence. This committee will develop safety standards and ethical guidelines for LEF's development.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
